Articles.Content: What are those rectangles I keep seeing in people's signatures? Do they have something to do with the reputation system or are they something else?
The ribbons? I don't have the link, but it's a website

It is, to the most basic level, people bragging about their archievements. You can go to a website and make them, then upload them to imgur, and put them in your signature.

Please don't do it. Please.
This is where you can get them, robopilot99, whether some other people want you to or not.

They're mission ribbons for the worlds you've been to and specific accomplishments on them. Mine are nothing at all to brag about; I just like them because I'm a military nerd and I think ribbons are really cool.

The image itself should be a clickable link to the site where you can make your own. Try it out!

Edited February 11, 2014 by RSwordsman
Seems like a nice way to add a bit of structure to the mission planning... at least until contracts get added in .24!
I agree, it's one way of keeping track of what you've done.
I might get mine soon but I want to get more stuff done first

It is, to the most basic level, people bragging about their archievements. You can go to a website and make them, then upload them to imgur, and put them in your signature.

Please don't do it. Please.

What in the name of jeb and bill and bob do you have against the ribbons? I wear mine on my signature with pride

Well, I'm not completely against them. It's just that the honor system doesn't work for everybody, and they can get pretty monotonous. I like people with original signatures, not just a bunch of ribbons that people will generally skip without looking at them.

Well, I'm not completely against them. It's just that the honor system doesn't work for everybody, and they can get pretty monotonous. I like people with original signatures, not just a bunch of ribbons that people will generally skip without looking at them.

Valid argument. I must admit that I never actually look at the ribbons

I was going to set them up but one look at that website and the concept that I'd have to go back every time I did ... well ... anything at all in the game made me just close down the tab in my browser and never go back
i likes my ribbons, and as I said I wear them on my signature with pride, but, I lack the skill to make a custom sig line like say you astropap1 or you 5thhorseman, so, ribbons must suffice lol

Mine's just a picture somebody posted here on the forums and gave me permission to use it, the logo for this thread, and a nice quote that didn't fit if I used the [ quote] [/quote ] tags. Really, using tables for this stuff is much better, but I'm too lazy to change my sig.

I know what you mean - I waited to get my station done myself

Edit: What, no winky smily?

Edit Edit: That's better!
I used to have ribbons... I didn't like them that much.
